summary: DevSecOps Architect and Agile Coach with a proven track record leading portfolio and product transformations, building SRE practices, and designing CI/CD at scale. Experienced in stakeholder management, Lean Portfolio Management (LPM), and improving operational maturity and reliability across complex application estates. Passionate about creating cultures of experimentation, automation, and continuous improvement.

Created and led an SRE practice to improve application reliability and automation adoption.
Co-created value streams to identify improvement opportunities and align to business outcomes.
Implemented Lean Portfolio Management (LPM) to focus initiatives on vision and strategy.
Drove cloud and DevSecOps transformation: migrated large app estate from on‑prem to Azure and introduced threat modeling.
Established an Agile CoE, training academy, and learning chapters (Security, Product, Scrum/Agile, Java, .NET, DevOps).
Built an app improvement/investment roadmap aligned to strategy and tracked using OKRs.
achievements: Increased site reliability score for all critical apps from Level 2: Developing to Level 3: Defined.
Reallocated ~40% of budget and reduced overall spend by ~£3m via LPM.
Migrated ~725 applications to Azure; established repeatable build/deploy patterns used by 20+ apps.
Reduced OpEx by ~12% and CapEx by ~23% through roadmap-driven investment.
Reduced attrition by ~7%, improved security coverage by ~7%, and upskilled ~25% of developers by one maturity level.
